titleStmt.title: Animadversions upon the doctrine of transubstantiation a sermon preached before the Right Honourable the lord mayor and the Court of Aldermen, Octob. XIX, 1679, at the Guild-Hall Chappel, London / by John Turner ...
titleStmt.author: Turner, John, b. 1649 or 50.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
